summary: Comprehensive testing of AppleCare+ activation management system completed. All critical bug fixes verified and all features working correctly. Backend: 14/14 tests passed (100%). Frontend: All UI tests passed.
passed_tests: CRITICAL BUG FIX: Form cursor no longer disappears after typing - InputField moved outside component
Public form - Billing Location and Payment Type fields are NOT visible (correctly hidden)
Public form - Plan dropdown shows format: Part Code - Description (₹MRP when available)
Admin login with admin@applecare.com / admin123 works correctly
Settings page - Tab correctly says 'TGME Support Ticket' (not osTicket)
Settings page - Apple Email field is a textarea for multiple emails with helper text
Settings page - AppleCare+ Plans tab has 'Sample' and 'Upload Excel' buttons
Settings page - Plans table shows columns: SKU, Description, MRP, Part Code, Status, Actions
Dashboard - Ticket ID column displays tgme_ticket_id properly
API: POST /api/activation-requests works without billing_location/payment_type fields
API: All authentication endpoints working (login, register, me, change-password)
API: All CRUD operations for plans working
API: Settings management working with multiple email support
Form submission creates activation request successfully
critical_code_review_comments: Code quality is good - InputField component correctly moved outside PublicForm to prevent re-creation on each render
Backend properly hardcodes billing_location='F9B4869273B7' and payment_type='Insta' as required
Settings model supports both new (tgme_*) and old (osticket_*) field names for backward compatibility
seed_data_creation: Created test plan with SKU TEST_S9999ZM/A and MRP ₹19,900 for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features are working correctly. The cursor bug fix has been verified - InputField component is now defined outside PublicForm component. TGME Support Ticket (renamed from osTicket) tab is present. Apple Email supports multiple comma-separated emails. Plans table has all required columns. Form submission works end-to-end.

mocked_apis.note: Email sending (send_activation_email) and TGME Support Ticket creation (create_tgme_ticket) are MOCKED/STUBS waiting for real credentials
affected_features: Automatic ticket creation in TGME system
